entities.name: dragon
entities.description: The dragon is described as a large creature with hard scales that can fly. It is also referred to as 'it' and is the main subject of the passage.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a person who climbs onto the dragon's back and holds on tightly. He is also referred to as 'he'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as a person who hoists herself up onto the dragon's back and screams in fear. She is also referred to as 'she'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as a person who climbs onto the dragon's back behind Harry and Hermione.

Hermione also rides on top of the dragon, hoisting herself up after Harry. This is described in the passage as 'Hermione hoisted herself up'.
Ron rides on top of the dragon behind Harry and Hermione. This is described in the passage as 'Ron climbed on behind them'.
